items.title: Vance says U.S. can still broker peace in Ukraine-Russia war
items.description: Vice President JD Vance contends that the United States has “seen some significant concessions from both sides” in the war between Ukraine and Russia.

items.title: Newly released Epstein files fall short of full transparency, Democrats say
items.description: While some far-right influencers hailed fresh vindication for Trump, Democrats blasted the Justice Department for releasing little that’s new about th...

items.title: Trump’s new chief design officer aims to make federal websites ‘satisfying’
items.description: Joe Gebbia, an Elon Musk ally who also worked for DOGE, said navigating dot-gov websites should be just as easy as visiting the Apple Store.

items.title: The House Freedom Caucus is under renovation
items.description: The far-right caucus is losing several of its most prominent members, creating an opening for new leaders and new approaches.

items.title: On WhatsApp, Palestinians in the U.S. look for food for Gaza — and mourn
items.description: The group chat provides a place for members to share their grief as tragedy after tragedy unfolds in the tiny enclave.
